msbt.message: Halloween is here! Well, it's this evening to be exact.Your preparations must have been exhausting. But now we can all indulge in some fun.
I have no doubt that your Halloween preparations are on point, .Yes, no doubt at all. But since the big event isn't until later, if you have more to dohurry!
If there's one thing that brings out the kid in me, it's most certainly Halloween.Some might think I'm too refined for all this, but really I can't wait for tonight!
I can't begin to imagine what's in store for us. Oh, the big Halloween event at last!Let's get in the right frame of mind, shall we? This will be a night to remember.
What am I thinking, not being in costume already? Why, my makeup alone will take an age to apply.It's almost like I'm scared to get started!
The curtain will soon rise on our Halloween spectacle. I canbarely contain my excitement.Oh, why bother? Tonight is going to be fun, !
Fascinating, isn't it? The pumpkin items on the island? There are only a few, but it makes one wonderSomeone is getting into the spirit of the season! I can only imagine who it might be, .
Is it just me, or are we seeing more and more pumpkin decorations? Who could be behind it all?Someone who's very into Halloween, that's who! And I couldn't be happier about it, .
You have seen them, haven't you? Pumpkins, everywhere! There are so many decorations!And the eyes, the eyes! Those jack-o'-lantern faces! Really, it's all so thrilling, .

Let me just askis there such a thing as too many pumpkin decorations?I usually frown on excess, but I love how Halloween really gets spirited!I'll admit that I'm excited for what's coming, especially the candy you'll be giving me, .
